en.title: FusionExcel's
en.content:
As part of FusionExcel's continue commitment to help the less fortunate, FusionExcel is proud to launch the global "Hope For Children" Charity at FusionExcel's Achievers Recognition Dinner at PGRM, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia on Saturday 08th August 2009 attended by 1,800 of FusionExcel's Leaders, Members, VIPs and Invited Guests. Children always has a special place in our hearts and as Organizer and Sponsor, FusionExcel will work tirelessly to raise funds to help improve the lives of the many needy and underprivileged children of this world. Our target is to raise at least USD 10 Millions over the next 5 years for this cause.

The Funds Will Be Raised In The Following Ways:

- Direct donations from FusionExcel, FusionExcel Members and The Public.
   
- USD 3 donated from the sale of every Quantum Science products.

At Itâ€™s Launch "Hope For Children"  Charity Fund Is Proud To Donate To The Following Charities:

- 6 Rotary Clubs in Malaysia, Bandar Utama, Metro Kuala Lumpur, Shah Alam, Tebrau, Titiwangsa and Johor Centennial. (Amount to be raised RM 300,000).  
   
- 5 Children Homes, supported by former Miss Malaysia, Maggie Loo, Nancie Foo, Datuk Yasmin Yusuff, Samantha Shubert and Deborah Henry. (Amount to be raised RM 100,000).   

As it's policy, "Hope For Children" Charity Fund will contribute 50% of the amount to be raised. The balance 50% will be raised by the NGOs themselves. The NGOs are encouraged to collaborate with FusionExcel as social entrepreneurs to raise the balance of funds, making it a win-win situation for both parties.

At the Launch, "Hope For Children" is proud to present 9 years old child singing sensation Clark Gamul from the Philippines who touched the hearts of the audience with his beautiful rendition of  3 Michael Jackson's songs namely "Ben", "I Will Be There" and "We Are The World". Clark also sang the theme song "Hope For Children" written specially for the occasion. FusionExcel is so proud of you, Clark! You are a Star!

Clark is a product of the Philippines Center For Arts Foundation, an NGO set up to train and nurture young and gifted children from poor families (Clark's father drives a trishaw in Manila, earning USD 5 a day) to excel in the performing arts and to provide them with a brighter future. "Hope For Children" will be working closely with the Philippines Center For Arts Foundation to raise funds to help more gifted children from poor families around the world to achieve their dreams, like Clark.
 
FusionExcel would like to appeal to all FusionExcel Leaders and Members to help promote and to participate generously in this worthy cause. "Hope For Children" will provide FusionExcel with greater credibility and awareness and will help propel FusionExcel to the next level of growth and recognition in the world. It will make us all proud to be part of the FusionExcel family!

Last but not least , A BIG THANK YOU to FusionExcel's Presidential Director and Philippines Country Licensee, Jeremy Looi for his personal donation of Pesos 1 Million (RM 80,000) to "Hope For Children" Charity at the Launch. God Bless You, Jeremy, for your kind and generous heart and for taking leadership in this worthy cause!  We are proud of you!

AHOO! AHOO!! AHOO!!!
